name: Magista
description:
Some fool apprentice violated the terms of summoning, and failed to properly bind Andras, the demon of anguish. After it wiped out the entire temple, its your job to banish this demon back to the underworld, before it causes more damage.

Instructions:

Sanctify your dagger by pressing LMB on the holy water fountain, only then you can damage Andras.

Make sure to be careful, and hide on the bushes.

Game made in 72 hours for Tazmen Game Jam.

Developers:

Rafael Vital @rafavla32

Tássio Miranda @isittacio
